00029 #ifndef _DEMUX_H_
00030 #define _DEMUX_H_
00031 
00032 #include "inxout.h"
00033 
00034 //tolua_begin
00035 typedef enum {
00036   rec_cell=0, 
00037   rec_frame=1
00038 } rec_type_t; // receiving data-type
00039 
00040 class   demux:  public  inxout {
00041 typedef inxout  baseclass;
00042 
00043 public: 
00044         demux();
00045         ~demux();
00046         char    *special(specmsg *, char *);
00047 
00048         int getOutpVCI(int vc) {return this->outp_tab[vc];}
00049         void setOutpVCI(int vc, int outp) {this->outp_tab[vc] = outp;}
00050         int getNewVCI(int vc) {return this->new_vci_tab[vc];}
00051         void  setNewVCI(int vc, int vci) {this->new_vci_tab[vc] = vci;}
00052         int act(void);
00053         void setRecTyp(int typ) {this->rec_type = (rec_type_t) typ;}
00054         int getRecTyp(void) {return (int) this->rec_type;}
00055 
00056 
00057         int             noutp;
00058         int             nvci;                   /* # of VCIs */
00059 //tolua_end
00060 
00061         rec_typ REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00062         rec_type_t rec_type;
00063 
00064         int             *outp_tab;              /* which VCI to which output? */
00065         int             *new_vci_tab;           /* new VCI */
00066 };  //tolua_export
00067 
00068 #endif  // _DEMUX_H_
